title: Drawing, "Peasants Listening to Itinerant Musicians on a Tree-lined Road", ca. 1665
medium: Red crayon, pen and brown ink on paper
inscribed: At lower right: Gennaro 1655. Gio. And[re]a Coppola fe[...]
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: An old man is playing a harp and a boy, holding a scroll, is singing; a dog is asleep on the left. The peasants, either standing or sitting, are gathered around the musicians. The background shows a view of a mountainous landscape with trees and houses.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Peasants Listening to Itinerant Musicians on a Tree-lined Road", ca. 1665.
ca. 1665. Red crayon, pen and brown ink on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-530.
